client.name: Stellar Information Technology (Pvt) Ltd.
client.address: 492/6, Galle Road, Colombo 06, Wellawatta, Sri Lanka

paragraphs: Thank you for showing interest in our website development services. We are excited about the opportunity to help your business establish a professional and impactful online presence.
To support growing businesses like yours, we're offering a completely free basic website, along with affordable options to add more advanced features if needed.

features.name: 3–4 Page Website
features.description: (Home, About Us, Services/Product, Contact with form)

why_we_do_this.content: We're committed to helping businesses make their first step online without high initial costs. In return, we ask for a small gesture as outlined in the Terms of Free Website Offer below.

terms.title: Complimentary Service
terms.content: The website design and development service is provided free of charge as a promotional offer.

terms.title: Domain & Hosting
terms.content: Client is responsible for domain registration (LKR 4,500/year) and hosting fees (LKR 1,000/month).

terms.title: Social Media Announcement Upon Offer Acceptance
terms.content: We kindly request that you announce on your official social media channels that you have started your website project with us, and tag our company. You do not need to mention any details about the offer.

terms.title: Post-Deployment Acknowledgment
terms.content: Upon successful project completion, we request that you share a post about your new website on your social media platforms, tagging our company to acknowledge our collaboration.

terms.title: Feedback & Review Request
terms.content: Provide a written review/testimonial; we may also request a short video or a review on Google, LinkedIn, or Facebook where applicable.

terms.title: Limited Time Offer
terms.content: This offer is subject to availability and may be withdrawn at any time.

next_steps.step: Proposal Acceptance – Please confirm to proceed.
Domain Registration – We'll help you secure your preferred domain.
Design Brief – We'll gather your requirements and preferences.
Development – Our team will build your website (5-7 business days).

addon_features.description: Add extra pages to your website
Basic chat integrated into your website
Smart chatbot trained on your data (FAQs, policies)
Let clients book appointments or services
